ygData.subject: RE: RE Instruments vs. melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ouch.  DDD and CoD are DoTs.  If they work like other DoTs and end up killing your friend while dueling, the game will consider it a DoT kill and not a
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Sep 1999, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> Yesterday, just for fun, I said "okay, I'm going to fight you without my
> weapons". She was a little confused, but a agreed. Twisting Hymn, DDD, and
> Chords with a lute equipped got her down to 15 HPs before we called it off.

Ouch. DDD and CoD are DoTs. If they work like other DoTs and
end up killing your friend while dueling, the game will
consider it a DoT kill and not a duel kill, and they will lose
experience. Be careful when doing this folks! Maybe some of
you L2-5 folks may want to test it for us with CoD.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
